attributes.action: Have A General Election If The Current Prime Minister Stands Down
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I believe that, should a Prime Minister stand down from his / her post then a general election should take place.

My example is that Tony Blair stood down as Prime Minister and Gordon Brown took over. Labour was not elected into power with Gordon Brown as leader but with Tony Blair as Leader.

The same happened when Margaret Thatcher stood down.
